control.visible: [Container.Content(movies) | Container.Content(sets) | Container.Content(tvshows) | Container.Content(seasons) | Container.Content(episodes)] | [!Skin.HasSetting(noRightlistCategorypanel) + [Container.Content(studios) | Container.Content(countries) | Container.Content(Years) | Container.Content(actors) | Container.Content(directors) | Container.Content(genres)]]

control.description: infoline rating und hauptinfo rechts neben sternen
infoline 1 bei Einstellung ohne rechts artwork statt plot
infoline 2 bei Einstellung ohne rechts artwork statt plot
